name: Dice Castle
description:
Dice based Tower-Defense game made for GMTK 2022

Place dice by dragging them over the tower with your mouse and placing them into the associated Damage, Speed or Range box.

Rotate the camera using "A" and "D".

Control speed with 1 & 2.

Survive all the rounds to win the game.

Made by Pet Pumpkin & Barry Lawnmower 

backing track available at https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Lobo_Loco/completly-free/free-monumental-folk-strings-f-012/
